column1: Little Goat Diner////Hot crab dip - It didn't taste bad but it didn't taste that amazing either.  It reminded me of what my parents would serve at a party when the Bears went to the SuperBowl in 1986.  The take-away point here is that it is old school and not inventive at all. Furthermore
column2: it was served with Ritz crackers.  I'm not hating on Ritz but seriously
column3: you couldn't have come up with a more inventive cracker than a freaking Ritz?
